post_title: Why should you have a Bitcoin ATM card in your wallet along with cash
post_text:
Bitcoin ATM Card is the future and should make place in your wallet with your cash.  The most important feature of is that the procedure is basic and easy to understand. Due to its simplicity and universal applicability its trend is picking up all over the world.

The first thing that you would have to do is to apply for a card. When you arrange this card it will be delivered within 2 to 3 days just like your normal ATM card that works all around the globe. You will also get a manual which will help you to know how to utilize this card.

This card has all the features of your normal debit or credit card. When you get this card you will be given an online control board that empowers you to deal with your assets. It will also provide you with balance checking feature. You can also see proclamation as well as exchange stores and transfer your reserves. Just like a regular card you can also change the PIN of the card. The main difference between an ATM card and this card is will empower you to transform your bitcoins into dollars which you can also  draw from an ATM near you irrespective of the country you are in. The card would have a bitcoin wallet address imprinted on the flip side of the card. So it is easy to check your balance into a bitcoin just like your regular ATM card. Presently you send bitcoin to the printed address, and cash will reflect into your card as ‘adjust’. Go to ATM machine and see your adjust and you will see cash in the card. In short your bitcoin card can effortlessly go back and forth in changing coins into dollars and pull back as well from ATM machines.

All the major countries in the world have this service. This card though has a strong hold in America and Canada. If you are on a vacation or business trip in European countries like United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, France, Greece, etc or in Australia you can find a bitcoin ATM near you. Developed Asian Countries like Japan, Vietnam also have the mechanism.  South Asian countries like India and Sri Lanka as well as African nations like Nigeria and Ghana have this service. Even if there is no bitcoin service in a particular country since they are linked to the bank accounts you can bring the balance in an ATM.

So don’t wait go for this amazing bitcoin card service which is picking up fast and is a part of your wallet like your cash, credit card and debit cards.
